input.sentences: there were many outfits to choose from for the party .
others resembled wild creatures worn only during festive events .
pants and hats were all possible options .
in the end | a long dress was chosen .
output.sentences: For the party, she had to figure out which of her outfits to choose and probably not the black skirt with red frills.
The black blouse was too plain and resembled everyday clothing.
The six-armed top had been worn for Halloween and it was surely too wild and resembled an insect.
The black pants with a hat was one of the options but probably wouldn't work.
In the end, the grey dress with upper body design was chosen.
